Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.","source":"Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.","identi":"See 'reference url' on the navigation bars.","relati":"Website: http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special/cff
http://louisdl.louislibraries.org/cdm4/index_LSU_CFF.php?CISOROOT=/LSU_CFF","catalo":{},"catala":{},"transd":"M26 de vous prevenir de ce que j’observe, et si vous voulez me permettre comme medecin de vous donner un conseil je vous dirais : vous avez a choisir entre le renouvellement immediat de toute la literie, matelas, couvertures etc, ou l’ordre donné de ne plus recevoir de malades. Ne voyez, Mr le president, dans tout ce que je vous dis là que la ferme conviction d’un medecin qui a le sentiment des devoirs qu il a a remplir. Agreez Mr le President l’assurance de mes meilleurs sentiments. Dr Pouatry N. O. 24 Octobre 1867.","typa":{},"genera":{},"fullrs":{},"find":"1085.jpg","dmaccess":{},"dmimage":{},"dmcreated":"2008-09-18","dmmodified":"2008-09-18","dmoclcno":{},"dmrecord":"1084","restrictionCode":"1","cdmfilesize":"777186","cdmfilesizeformatted":"0.74 MB","cdmprintpdf":"0","cdmhasocr":"0","cdmisnewspaper":"0"}
